about_the_game:
Exploration & Revelation

Fragments of the conspiracy are scattered throughout the abandoned amusement park, and every clue you uncover can alter the course of the game, leading to multiple endings. Collect and piece together clues to unravel the hidden truth behind Kiln People Revelations!

Fight to the End

Control the Kiln Person to battle your enemies. Make the most of the environment and apply strategic tactics to survive and thrive in this brutal game.

Metagaming

Your actions will directly shape the course of the game, carving out your own unique path. As the boundaries between in-game and real-life experiences become increasingly fluid, the program team is attentive to your choices that transcend the fourth wall.

Interactive Narrative

As you interact with Kiln Person 42, your relationship will evolve with the unfolding plot, leading to unexpected twists.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In 2X42, minds can be transplanted to Kiln People. You're invited to Kiln People Revelations, where you must control your Kiln Person to defeat enemies and win the prize. However, you uncover a conspiracy lurking behind the show, and now you face a choice: fight to the end, or expose the ugly truth.
